name: Lens
description: A interactive component that enables zooming into images, videos and other elements.

metadata.title: Lens
metadata.description: A interactive component that enables zooming into images, videos and other elements.
metadata.author: h3rmel

props.name: children
props.description: The content that will be magnified by the lens

props.name: zoomFactor
props.description: The magnification factor of the lens

props.name: lensSize
props.description: The size of the lens in pixels (works as a diameter)

props.name: position
props.description: The current position of the lens

props.name: defaultPosition
props.description: The initial position of the lens

props.name: isStatic
props.description: Determines if the lens will remain in a fixed position

props.name: duration
props.description: Duration of the animation when the lens moves (in seconds)

props.name: lensColor
props.description: The color of the lens (CSS color value)

props.name: ariaLabel
props.description: Accessibility label for the lens component
